name: AXClassic
short_description:
AXClassic Emulator is a blend of old school game play with original and custom content.
 AXClassic carries the original EQBOTS code, and is still worked on by original and new coders.
 Our goal here is to try and bring you back to a time where your heart was in the original (classic) zones, and places like Butcherblock and South Karana were in your thoughts and dreams.
 Only this time, you'll have that "prefect group" you wanted with you at all times.
 With EQBOTS, you'll be able to go anywhere in the game, build impressive raid groups, and take on the toughest raid bosses.
You'll be going places that were never possible when you played before.
 AXClassic also sports the most simplified home box version of EqEmu with it's AXClassic Repack.
 The AXClassic Repack is a full install of everything you need to mount a "play at home" server, all with a simple click of your mouse.
